targets.expr:
topk(5, sum by (name,level) (rate(promtail_custom_bad_words_total{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval])) - 
sum by (name,level) (rate(promtail_custom_bad_words_total{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval] offset 1h)))

sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"loki-ingester.*", status_code!~"5[0-9]{2}", route="/logproto.Pusher/Push"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route)
/
sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"loki-ingester.*", route="/logproto.Pusher/Push"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route) > 0

sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"loki-querier", status_code!~"5[0-9]{2}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route)
/
sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"loki-querier"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route) > 0

sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"loki-ingester.*", status_code!~"5[0-9]{2}", route=~"/logproto.Querier/Query|/logproto.Querier/Label|/logproto.Querier/Series|/logproto.Querier/QuerySample|/logproto.Querier/GetChunkIDs"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route)
/
sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"loki-ingester.*", route=~"/logproto.Querier/Query|/logproto.Querier/Label|/logproto.Querier/Series|/logproto.Querier/QuerySample|/logproto.Querier/GetChunkIDs"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route) > 0

sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"loki-querier", status_code!~"5[0-9]{2}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route)
/
sum(rate(loki_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"loki-querier"}[$__rate_interval])) by (route) > 0
histogram_quantile(.99, sum(rate(loki_memcache_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[5m])) by (method, name, le, container))
histogram_quantile(.9, sum(rate(loki_memcache_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[5m])) by (method, name, le, container))
histogram_quantile(.5, sum(rate(loki_memcache_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[5m])) by (method, name, le, container))
